title: AUTHOR'S QUERY
html:
AUTHOR'S QUERY

In Tender Is the Night, F. Scott Fitzgerald uses the expression he saw with his heels. Does anyone know of other appearances of the phrase?

Matthew J. Bruccoli

2006 Sumter Street

Columbia, SC 29201-2157
